cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is a slightly sun-damaged Honda Civic with one squeaky break. It drives, though!
You know you want it, you know you need it! The Tesla Model X, 'nuff said.
This is not a cheap car, but worth at least half the price! So if you want your car to be bigger than anything else in your life, this is the car for you!
